name: Block Piece Fit
description:
Play the game you will be returning to his childhood, the time when the most classic game was born such as puzzle, tile, diamonds, block. Block Piece Fit with simple but addictive gameplay once you start, you will not stop playing.

Features:
.Block themed puzzle
.Only to clear full lines vertically and horizontally
.Train your brain and logic thinking
.Colorful block match in the game
.Puzzle ends after no more space
.Excited music and beautiful background
